div.h4: The park is opening for the new season soon. You want to create a big opening party. The party has to both be for children and adults. The board of directors is meeting to make a brainstorm, showing different activities for the guests to do.
div.h6: Write in the space below. Click "Enter" every time you have written an idea. While writing, you can see others' ideas on the screen. Click on the text in the big space, when you are ready for brainstorming. Go to the next task when you cannot think of anymore ideas. You automatically go to the next task after 3 minutes.
